name: Sunsilk Volume and Bounce Shampoo
description: Does your hair look thin and flat? Do you desire voluminous and bouncy hair? Look no further! Sunsilk presents all New Coconut Water and Aloe Vera Volume Hair shampoo. It is infused with the goodness of natural ingredients like coconut water and aloe vera. This exclusive product refreshes your hair without weighing it down, giving it volume and natural bounce. Coconut water is known to be rich in vitamins and minerals and feel uplifting and refreshing. Aloe vera is well known for its moisturizing and nourishing properties. So experience the rich fragrance and get beautiful volume and bouncy hair with the New Sunsilk Coconut Water and Aloe Vera Volume Shampoo now. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
